## function_createToast
> **createToast**(`props`?): [`ToastWidget`](#toastwidget)

Create an ToastWidget with given config props

### Parameters

#### props?

[`PropsConfig`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#propsconfig)\<[`ToastProps`](#toastprops)\>

### Returns

[`ToastWidget`](#toastwidget)

an ToastWidget

## function_getToastDefaultConfig

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Toast config

## interface_ToastApi
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:239

Represents the API for the toast component.

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(): `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:244

Triggers alert closing programmatically (same as clicking on the close button (×)).

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:250

Triggers the alert to be displayed for the user.

##### Returns

`void`

## interface_ToastContext
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:20

Represents the context for a Toast widget.
This interface is an alias for `WidgetSlotContext<ToastWidget>`.

### Properties

#### api

> **api**: [`ToastApi`](#toastapi)

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:75](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/types.ts#L75)

all the api functions to interact with the widget

***

#### directives

> **directives**: [`ToastDirectives`](#toastdirectives)

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:71](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/types.ts#L71)

directives to be used on html elements in the template of the widget or in the slots

***

#### state

> **state**: [`ToastState`](#toaststate)

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:88](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/863721bb9c0a8edf231e6372cee0ac10a1361a9b/core/src/types.ts#L88)

the state of the widget

## interface_ToastDirectives
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:256

Interface representing the directives for a toast component.

### Properties

#### autoHideDirective

> **autoHideDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:266

Directive that handles the autohide of the toast component

***

#### bodyDirective

> **bodyDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:271

Directive that adds all the necessary attributes to the body

***

#### closeButtonDirective

> **closeButtonDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:276

Directive that adds all the necessary attributes to the close button depending on the presence of the header

***

#### transitionDirective

> **transitionDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:261

the transition directive, piloting what is the visual effect of going from hidden to visible

## interface_ToastProps
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:95

Interface representing the properties for the Toast component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:157

If `true`, alert closing will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when clicked on the close button (×),
via the `.close()` function or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### animatedOnInit

> **animatedOnInit**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:147

If `true`, alert opening will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when the `.open()` function is called
or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:180

Accessibility close button label

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### autoHide

> **autoHide**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:194

If `true` automatically hides the toast after the delay.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ToastContext`](#toastcontext)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:211

Template for the toast content

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:187

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### delay

> **delay**: `number`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:201

Delay in milliseconds before hiding the toast.

##### Default Value

`5000`

***

#### dismissible

> **dismissible**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:165

If `true`, alert can be dismissed by the user.
The close button (×) will be displayed and you can be notified of the event with the (close) output.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### header

> **header**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ToastContext`](#toastcontext)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:216

Header template for the toast component

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:125

Callback called when the alert is hidden.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:136

Callback called when the alert is shown.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:114

Callback called when the alert visibility changed.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ToastContext`](#toastcontext)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:206

Global template for the toast component

***

#### transition

> **transition**: [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:104

The transition function will be executed when the alert is displayed or hidden.

Depending on the value of `animatedOnInit`, the animation can be optionally skipped during the showing process.

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:172

If `true` the alert is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`

## interface_ToastState

If `true` automatically hides the toast after the delay.

`true`

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ToastContext`](#toastcontext)\>

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

***

#### delay

> **delay**: `number`

***

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:38

If `true`, alert can be dismissed by the user.

`true`

***

#### header

> **header**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ToastContext`](#toastcontext)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:89

Header template for the toast component

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:30

Is `true` when the alert is hidden. Compared to `visible`, this is updated after the transition is executed.

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ToastContext`](#toastcontext)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:79

Global template for the toast component

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/toast/toast.gen.ts:45

If `true` the alert is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`

## type alias_ToastWidget
> **ToastWidget**: [`Widget`](../../../../api/svelte/bootstrap/components/toast/../../types#widget)\<[`ToastProps`](#toastprops), [`ToastState`](#toaststate), [`ToastApi`](#toastapi), [`ToastDirectives`](#toastdirectives)\>
